get.description: List home properties with the requested parameters. Buy/Rent \u003e Homes. Filters are optional parameters, please make sure the request follows the rules in each parameter.  Boolean parameters should be true always if you want to use them. To make them false, don't include them in the requests (leave blank).

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by one of the followings: relevance|lowestprice|highestprice|mostrecent|leastrecent|highestpricereduction|lowestpricem2|highestpricem2|biggest|smallest|highestfloors|lowestfloors Default is relevance.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Search sales or rentals. Pick between: sale|rent

parameters.name: maxItems
parameters.description: Number of items to return. Set 0 to return the item's count, fast response. Max Value is 40, anything above will be ignored.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: One of the following values: es|pt|it

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The language of the ads. Pick between: es|it|pt|en|ca|de|fr|nl|nb

parameters.name: micrositeShortName
parameters.description: Get ads from a specific real estate. For example if the URL from the real estate is: https://www.idealista.com/pro/cajal-gestion-inmobiliaria/ The parameter micrositeShortName should be cajal-gestion-inmobiliaria

parameters.name: minSize
parameters.description: Minimum size to search in m2.

parameters.name: maxSize
parameters.description: Maximum size to search in m2.

parameters.name: furnished
parameters.description: Furnishings parameter. ONLY valid when operation=rent. Pick between. Indifferent: leave blank (default) | Furnished: furnished | Only furnished kitchens: furnishedKitchen

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 24h: T (Rent operation only) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 24h: T (Rent operation only) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 24h: T (Rent operation only) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 24h: T (Rent operation only) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

get.description: Get more details about a property.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: One of the following values: es|pt|it

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The language of the ad. Pick between: en, es, it, pt, ca, de, fr, nl, nb

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by one of the followings: relevance|lowestprice|highestprice|mostrecent|leastrecent|highestpricereduction|lowestpricem2|highestpricem2|biggest|smallest|highestfloors|lowestfloors Default is relevance.

parameters.name: micrositeShortName
parameters.description: Get ads from a specific real estate. For example if the URL from the real estate is: https://www.idealista.com/pro/cajal-gestion-inmobiliaria/ The parameter micrositeShortName should be cajal-gestion-inmobiliaria

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 24h: T (Rent operation only) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: Location Id that has the flag divisible=true.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: One of the following values: es|pt|it

parameters.name: propertyType
parameters.description: Changes the 'total' field which indicates the number of properties of this type. Note: bedrooms only works with rent operation.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Changes the 'total' field which indicates the number of properties with this operation.

parameters.name: micrositeShortName
parameters.description: Microsite ShortName is the identifier of every real estate profile. You may find it in the URL: idealista.com/pro/sierra-blanca-estates-realty/

get.description: Get the locations where the microsite/profile has properties.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: One of the following values: es|pt|it

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 24h: T (Rent operation only) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

get.description: List office properties with the requested parameters. Buy/Rent \u003e Offices. Filters are optional parameters, please make sure the request follows the rules in each parameter.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Search sales or rentals. Pick between: sale|rent

parameters.name: layout
parameters.description: Distribution parameter. Pick between: Indifferent: leave blank (default) Open plan: openPlan Divided by walls: withWalls

parameters.name: buildingType
parameters.description: Type of building parameter. Pick between: Indifferent: leave blank (default) Exclusively for offices: exclusive Mixted use: mixed

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 24h: T (Rent operation only) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

get.description: List renting rooms with the requested parameters. Buy, Rent \u003e Rooms or Share \u003e Homes.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by one of the followings: relevance|lowestprice|highestprice|mostrecent|leastrecent|highestpricereduction|lowestpricem2|highestpricem2|biggest|smallest|highestfloors|lowestfloors Default is relevance.

parameters.name: newGender
parameters.description: 'You are' parameter (your gender). Pick between: male|female

parameters.name: smokingPolicy
parameters.description: Pick between: Indiferent: leave blank (default) | Smoking allowed: allowed | Smoking is not allowed: disallowed

parameters.name: petsPolicy
parameters.description: Pets. Pick between: Indifferent: leave blank (default) Pets allowed: allowed Pets not allowed: disallowed

parameters.name: availableFrom
parameters.description: Date the room is available. Pick between: Any date: leave blank (default) Available now: now +1 month since now: 1m +2 months since now: 2m +3 months since now: 3m +4 months since now: 4m +5 months since now: 5m

parameters.name: occupation
parameters.description: Flat sharing with... Pick one of these: Indifferent: leave blank (default) With workers: workers With students: students

parameters.name: sinceDate
parameters.description: Publication Date Parameter. One of the following values. Indifferent: leave blank (by default) | Last 48h: Y (Buy operation only) | Last week: W | Last month: M

parameters.name: location
